Text:
@israelis_r_pigs 

You are a prize racist, bigotted idiot.  No better than polanski himself.

What has his religion got to do with anything?

What has your opinion of his country got to do with anything?

What has boycotting Israel and USA got to do with stopping terrorism?

The way to stop the RADICALIST people who twist religion, and throw their Hatred around, is to stamp out small minded idiots LIKE YOU!!!

Stop using this genuine news story, and the point that Polanski should be brought to justice for his crime, to project your own personal bigotted pathetic opinions.

Opinions are like arseholes, we've all got them, doesn't mean you should share them.  But obviously you do......
